name: TrickSand
description:
A game for the HEART Jam.

Use wall jumps, double jumps and the ability to swim through sand to collect emeralds and escape!

Controls:

  • Left key / Right key or A / D move left or right on the ground
  • C / K / Up key for jump / wall jump / double jump
  • Down key / S to enter the sand
  • WASD/Arrow keys to swim through the sand
